biz.pavonis.hexameter.api

Interface HexagonalGrid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HexagonalGridImpl

    public interface HexagonalGrid

    Represents a hexagonal grid. Use HexagonalGridBuilder to generate a ready-to-use grid. This interface contains all common functionality for

    • getting a Hexagon by its grid coordinates
    • getting the neighbors of a Hexagon
    • calculating the distance (in hexagons) between two Hexagons
    • calculating the movement range starting from a Hexagon using a range
    • getting a Hexagon by a pixel coordinate
    This HexagonalGrid uses an axial (trapezoidal) coordinate system for easier computation. This means that apart from the X axis a diagonal axis is used instead of the vertical Y axis.

    • Method Detail

      • getHexagons

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Hexagon> getHexagons()
        Returns all Hexagons contained in this grid.
        Returns:
        hexagons

      • getHexagonsByAxialRange

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Hexagon> getHexagonsByAxialRange(int gridXFrom,
                                                              int gridXTo,
                                                              int gridZfrom,
                                                              int gridZTo)
                                                                throws HexagonNotFoundException
        Returns all Hexagons contained in the given axial coordinate range. If the range contains coordinates which are not part of the grid it will throw a HexagonNotFoundException .
        Parameters:
        gridXFrom - from x inclusive
        gridXTo - to x inclusive
        gridZfrom - from z inclusive
        gridZTo - to z inclusive
        Returns:
        Hexagons in the given range.
        Throws:
        HexagonNotFoundException

      • getHexagonsByOffsetRange

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Hexagon> getHexagonsByOffsetRange(int gridXFrom,
                                                               int gridXTo,
                                                               int gridYfrom,
                                                               int gridYTo)
                                                                 throws HexagonNotFoundException
        Returns all Hexagons contained in the given offset coordinate range.
        Parameters:
        gridXFrom - from x inclusive
        gridXTo - to x inclusive
        gridYfrom - from z inclusive
        gridYTo - to z inclusive
        Returns:
        Hexagons in the given range.
        Throws:
        HexagonNotFoundException

      • containsCoordinate

        boolean containsCoordinate(int gridX,
                         int gridZ)
        Tells whether the given axial coordinate is on the grid or not. If you want to look up by offset coordinate use CoordinateConverter.
        Parameters:

        gridZ -
        Returns:
        is it on the grid?

      • getByGridCoordinate

        Hexagon getByGridCoordinate(int gridX,
                          int gridZ)
                            throws HexagonNotFoundException
        Fetches a Hexagon by its grid coordinate. If no Hexagon found at the given location it throws a HexagonNotFoundException.
        Parameters:
        gridX - grid x coordinate
        gridZ - grid z coordinate
        Returns:
        Hexagon
        Throws:
        HexagonNotFoundException

      • getByPixelCoordinate

        Hexagon getByPixelCoordinate(double x,
                           double y)
                             throws HexagonNotFoundException
        Returns a Hexagon by a pixel coordinate. Throws HexagonNotFoundException if there were no Hexagon at the given coordinates. Please note that all pixel coordinates are relative to the containing HexagonalGrid.
        Parameters:
        x - pixel x coordinate
        y - pixel y coordinate
        Returns:
        Hexagon
        Throws:
        HexagonNotFoundException

        Returns all neighbors of a Hexagon.
        Parameters:
        hexagon - Hexagon
        Returns:
        the Hexagon's neighbors

        Clears all satellite data attached to the Hexagons in this grid.
